feed.title: Slink Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.3.3
entry.content:
Follow-up patch addressing an issue introduced in the previous release. For details, please refer to v1.3.2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.3.2...v1.3.3

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

This release adds Amazon S3 (General Purpose Bucket) support as a new storage provider option. Please refer to the AWS documentation for more information.

[!NOTE] While this storage provider is optional, keep in mind that upon configuring it as your main storage destination, you may be charged by Amazon. See their pricing.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.3.3...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.4.1
entry.content:
Just a minor patch to bump node version to 22.12.0 and tweak some infrastructure.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.4.2
entry.content:
Improved responsiveness and layout for smaller screens.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.4.3
entry.content:
Temporarily hide displaying Slink version in startup script since it might not always correspond to the actual version (was introduced in v1.4.1).

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3
